name: Zuzo
longDescription:
High performing, highly engaged, and long-serving. These are the characteristics of teams that openly and authentically celebrate good work. But how do make a habit of it? How do you absorb it into your culture?

**Good news.** You already have the key ingredients:
* A team that does good work.
* People who see and value the good work being done around them.

By making it easy, social, and rewarding to articulate that appreciation, Zuzo turns your ingredients into the fuel for a self-propelled employee recognition machine that's built right into your Microsoft Teams experience.
**How It Works:**
* ü™ô **Rewards Credits:** Every team member begins the month with 100 credits. These can be given out to colleagues through written messages of appreciation. Credits are topped up each month.
* üì¢ **Recognition Channel:** Choose a Teams channel to be your designated venue for public exchanges of recognition. People will be able to post into the channel and celebrate one another's contributions.
* üéâ **Nominate & Endorse:** Appreciating some good work? Capture the moment in a Zuzo nomination and post it into your recognition channel. Others on the team can then respond to and endorse your nomination to pile on the praise.
* üéÅ **Meaningful Rewards:** All nominations and endorsements carry a corresponding credit reward that is selected by the giver. These are instantly transferred onto the recipients' Zuzo app for them to treat themselves to meaningful rewards.
* üíö **Drive Values:** Every nomination is an opportunity to reinforce your team's values by giving users the option of tagging a value in their submission.

**Then What?**
The power of true peer-driven recognition begins to play out. Quiet performers start to get noticed. Stand-out moments receive generous praise and additional top-ups to their Zuzo Card. Employees spend their balances on meaningful rewards. People begin to look out for and reinforce their colleagues' good work. Culture shift.

**Getting Started**
In order to use this app you must have an active Zuzo account. Please visit [www.zuzocard.com](https://www.zuzocard.com) to get started, or contact us for more details at [hello@zuzocard.com](mailto:hello@zuzocard.com).

**Have Questions or Feedback?**
Email us at [support@zuzocard.com](mailto:support@zuzocard.com) or connect with us via our [LinkedIn Page](https://www.linkedin.com/company/zuzocard).
You can also peruse our FAQs at [www.zuzocard.com](https://www.zuzocard.com).

Supported clients: Microsoft Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365. Currently only available in South Africa. More regions coming soon.
shortDescription: Simple, peer-driven recognition & rewards to make people feel truly appreciated.
